definition: Drinking the water of a well, one should never forget who dug it. (idiom)
pinyin: chi1 shui3 bu4 wang4 jue2 jing3 ren2

definition: to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Jing, one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/surname Jing
